name: VRferapy Home - Fear2Fly
summary: Fear2Fly provides virtual flying experience for user who want to test if they are afraid of such kind of environment. The application contains different scenarios including walk-in cabin, flight ascending and descending scene. Free to download and allow trial users to test the application with default scenarios. Monthly subscribed user can play more customized scenarios (seating, weather, cabin-steadiness) on different situations and play records management.
